entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
